languages.text: "Долг вменяет служителям Адептус Администратум быть осведомленными — иначе польза нашего служения порядку Империума будет сомнительна. По тем же соображениям я не могу раскрыть свои источники".

traits.locale_text: "Не недооценивайте возможности Адептус Администратум, Ваша Светлость. Мы отнюдь не столь глухи и слепы, как то рисуют некоторые неблагонадежные субъекты за пределами этих стен".

languages.text: "Duty dictates that Adeptus Administratum officials always be adequately informed — otherwise, our service to the Imperium's order would be of rather questionable use. Unfortunately, it is for this same reason that I cannot disclose my sources to you."
languages.original_text: "Долг вменяет служителям Адептус Администратум быть осведомленными — иначе польза нашего служения порядку Империума будет сомнительна. По тем же соображениям я не могу раскрыть свои источники".

traits.locale_text: "Duty dictates that Adeptus Administratum officials always be adequately informed — otherwise our service to the Imperium's order would be of questionable use. Unfortunately, it is also for this reason that I cannot disclose my sources to you."

"Duty dictates that Adeptus Administratum officials always be adequately informed — otherwise our service to the Imperium's order would be of questionable use. Unfortunately, it is also for this reason that I cannot disclose my sources to you."

"Duty dictates that Adeptus Administratum officials always be adequately informed — otherwise, our service to the Imperium's order would be of rather questionable use. Unfortunately, it is for this same reason that I cannot disclose my sources to you."

languages.text: 「責務上、帝国行政局の役人は常に十分な情報を得ていなければなりません。さもなくば、私たちの帝国秩序への奉仕など、実に疑わしいものとなってしまうでしょう。残念ながら、まさにその理由ゆえに、私の情報源をあなたに明かすことはできないのです」
languages.original_text: "Duty dictates that Adeptus Administratum officials always be adequately informed — otherwise, our service to the Imperium's order would be of rather questionable use. Unfortunately, it is for this same reason that I cannot disclose my sources to you."

traits.locale_text: 「責務上、帝国行政局の役人は常に十分な情報を得ていなければなりません。さもなくば、私たちの帝国秩序への奉仕など、実に疑わしいものとなってしまうでしょう。残念ながら、まさにその理由ゆえに、私の情報源をあなたに明かすことはできないのです」

languages.text: "Die Pflicht verlangt, dass offizielle Vertreter des Adeptus Administratum stets angemessen informiert sind ... andernfalls wäre unser Dienst für die Ordnung des Imperiums von eher fragwürdigem Nutzen. Leider darf ich aus demselben Grund meine Quellen nicht preisgeben."
languages.original_text: "Duty dictates that Adeptus Administratum officials always be adequately informed — otherwise, our service to the Imperium's order would be of rather questionable use. Unfortunately, it is for this same reason that I cannot disclose my sources to you."

traits.locale_text: "Die Pflicht verlangt, dass offizielle Vertreter des Adeptus Administratum stets angemessen informiert sind ... andernfalls wäre unser Dienst für die Ordnung des Imperiums von eher fragwürdigem Nutzen. Leider darf ich aus demselben Grund meine Quellen nicht preisgeben."

languages.text: « Le sens du devoir impose aux agents de l'Adeptus Administratum d'être toujours informés de manière adéquate... Sans cela, notre utilité au sein de l'ordre de l'Imperium serait pour le moins discutable. Malheureusement, c'est pour cette même raison que je ne suis pas en mesure de vous indiquer mes sources. »
languages.original_text: "Duty dictates that Adeptus Administratum officials always be adequately informed — otherwise, our service to the Imperium's order would be of rather questionable use. Unfortunately, it is for this same reason that I cannot disclose my sources to you."

traits.locale_text: « Le sens du devoir impose aux agents de l'Adeptus Administratum d'être toujours informés de manière adéquate... Sans cela, notre utilité au sein de l'ordre de l'Imperium serait pour le moins discutable. Malheureusement, c'est pour cette même raison que je ne suis pas en mesure de vous indiquer mes sources. »

languages.text: «El deber exige que los funcionarios del Adeptus Administratum estén bien informados. De lo contrario, nuestra utilidad para el Imperium sería más que dudosa. Por desgracia, este mismo motivo me impide revelarle mis fuentes».
languages.original_text: "Duty dictates that Adeptus Administratum officials always be adequately informed — otherwise, our service to the Imperium's order would be of rather questionable use. Unfortunately, it is for this same reason that I cannot disclose my sources to you."

traits.locale_text: «El deber exige que los funcionarios del Adeptus Administratum estén bien informados. De lo contrario, nuestra utilidad para el Imperium sería más que dudosa. Por desgracia, este mismo motivo me impide revelarle mis fuentes».

languages.text: “由于职责所在，帝国内政部的官员必须时刻掌握充足的情报，否则我们对帝国的服务恐怕会出现相当严重的问题。遗憾的是，基于同样原因，我无权向您透露我的情报来源。”
languages.original_text: "Duty dictates that Adeptus Administratum officials always be adequately informed — otherwise, our service to the Imperium's order would be of rather questionable use. Unfortunately, it is for this same reason that I cannot disclose my sources to you."

traits.locale_text: “由于职责所在，帝国内政部的官员必须时刻掌握充足的情报，否则我们对帝国的服务恐怕会出现相当严重的问题。遗憾的是，基于同样原因，我无权向您透露我的情报来源。”

languages.text: "Vazife, Adeptus Administratum mensuplarının daima yeteri kadar bilgilendirilmesini gerektirir. Aksi durumda İmparatorluk düzenine verdiğimiz hizmet sorgulanabilir. Aynı sebepten ötürü kaynaklarımı sizinle paylaşamam."
languages.original_text: "Duty dictates that Adeptus Administratum officials always be adequately informed — otherwise, our service to the Imperium's order would be of rather questionable use. Unfortunately, it is for this same reason that I cannot disclose my sources to you."

traits.locale_text: "Vazife, Adeptus Administratum mensuplarının daima yeteri kadar bilgilendirilmesini gerektirir. Aksi durumda İmparatorluk düzenine verdiğimiz hizmet sorgulanabilir. Aynı sebepten ötürü kaynaklarımı sizinle paylaşamam."
